channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Helicopter Hoist Rescue; INC#1412; 06:31PM; 1 Nike Site; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3i17IHK" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3i17IHK</a>; #Encino; Firefighters have located an adult male mountain biker who sustained an injury on a remote trail (near a former NIKE Missile Control Site near Mullholland Drive and Mandeville Fire Road). LAFD Rescue Helicopter has lowered a flight paramedic to provide treatment and prepare for a hoist operation. The patient will soon be hoisted, followed by the rescuer, for continue in-flight care during direct air transport to an area hospital. ; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC10 BP109 E109 E293 E93 H1 H7 HA1 HA7 HL1 RA83 RA93 RH114 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1306; 05:54PM; 3322 N Barham Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RxY6qU" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RxY6qU</a>; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters investigating the source of the smoke inside of the two-story fourplex found a small fire involving contents only (no structural involvement yet). Crews quickly snuffed out the small fire, and will remain on scene to evacuate the smoke from the building using blowers. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 E227 E260 E41 E60 E76 E82 RA76 RA86 SO1 T27 T60; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1306; 05:33PM; 3322 N Barham Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3RxY6qU" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3RxY6qU</a>; #Hollywood Hills; PRELIM: Two-story fourplex with smoke showing.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 E227 E260 E41 E60 E76 RA76 RA86 T27 T60; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire - Contained; INC#0161; 03:21AM; 7529 W Franklin Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3Vv5l4f" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3Vv5l4f</a>; #Hollywood; Firefighters have extinguished a 20’ x 20’ vegetation fire that consumed grass, trees and a shed. Due to the location and access issues it took firefighters 81 minutes (4:42am) to extinguish the flames. LAFD Air Operations provided critical water drops to keep it from growing while ground crews gained access. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC18 BC5 E227 E235 E261 E27 E41 E447 E56 E61 E90 EM5 H1 H3 H5 HA1 HA3 HA5 RA41 T27 T35 T61; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0122; 02:57AM; 4991 E Almaden Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3Vuwkga" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3Vuwkga</a>; #EagleRock; Thirty firefighters responded to the *one-story* home where they found fire in the basement. A well coordinated fire attack with interior fire attack and vertical (rooftop) ventilation resulted in the flames being extinguished in 24 minutes, without injury. Cause under investigation.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 BC5 BC701 E12 E212 E250 E42 E55 RA12 RA55 T12 T50; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0122; 02:33AM; 4991 E Almaden Dr; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3Vuwkga" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3Vuwkga</a>; #EagleRock; Two-story home with fire in the basement. Offensive mode.; FS 55; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 BC5 BC701 E12 E212 E250 E42 E55 RA12 RA55 T12 T50; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0111; 02:36AM; 2255 W 14th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3xh4Z9l" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3xh4Z9l</a>; #PicoUnion; Thirty-two firefighters knocked down the outside fire, keeping the flames out of the nearby apartment building, in 23 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC701 E10 E11 E13 E210 E211 RA13 RA813 SQ21 T10 T11; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0111; 02:13AM; 2255 W 14th St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3xh4Z9l" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3xh4Z9l</a>; #PicoUnion; Detached shed on fire, threatening a 3-story apartment house.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC701 E10 E11 E13 E210 E211 RA13 RA813 SQ21 T10 T11; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0092; 02:07AM; 6706 N Blucher Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3yY6g5u" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3yY6g5u</a>; #VanNuys; Thirty-two firefighters responded to the one-story home where they found heavy fire in one room. A well coordinated fire attack with vertical (rooftop) ventilation resulted in the flames being extinguished in 24 minutes, without injury. Cause under investigation.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC14 E239 E290 E39 E81 E88 RA39 RA839 T39 T90; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange
